JobFullDesc:
SeatGeek is looking for someone to both lead and grow our teams of Project & Program Managers. You will lead and build a motivated team that will be driven to achieve excellent client experience.
Reporting to the EVP of Global Client Experience, you will manage a team of Project Managers and Program Managers who own longer term engagements with our largest clients. However, more importantly, you own client experience and the management of both internal and external partners.
What you'll do

Overall responsibility for client experience through planning, executing, tracking and managing cost, schedules, and scope for all projects in the portfolio.
Evolve our existing SGE methodologies and processes in accordance with industry best practices and innovations that will make SGE and our clients even more successful.
Work across all of our SGE teams, our clients and our suppliers to ensure all active projects are managed and delivered to the highest standards from sales handover through to project completion.
Be a highly passionate and vocal client advocate. Working with all SGE teams and partners, to put the client, and their fans, at the center of all we do and deliver.
Direct project portfolio activities, conduct reviews, use technical and business acumen to manage risk and address escalated situations.
Enforce consistency and standardize processes across the team and the broader organization.
Coach and mentor the team to ensure continued high performance whilst also ensuring a positive, flexible and nimble culture.
Ongoing interaction and collaboration with senior and executive level management.
Manage, report, analyze and impact the client experience and financial metrics/KPIs of our project and program portfolio.

Who you are

10+ years in Project and Program management experience across a diverse scope of functional disciplines.
5+ years experience leading a team of people, including employee evaluations, goal setting and development planning.
Ability and excitement to travel up to 30% of the time as needed to support our clients
Have a passion for technology and how it can positively help the world.
Passionate about live events and the experience they bring to consumers via our clients.
Highly experienced technology and enterprise professional with a delivery background and proven success metrics in a fast moving environment.
Experience working in a leadership role within a range of project management methodologies at all scales, from Agile to Waterfall.
Experience in a leadership capacity within project management, tracking, resourcing & planning, budget forecasting and results reporting.
Excellent articulation and writing skills; the ability to drive focused conversations; the ability to effectively perform all levels of reporting, from executive to team-level.
Experience in re-defining process and operations to improve delivery and customer success. Process-driven, but humancentric.
Eager to question and challenge existing processes to ensure positive outcomes
Experience defining, tracking, and delivering on KPI's and scorecards.
Attention to detail, proactiveness, and passion for driving and delivering results through the collaboration and management of others.

Perks

Equity stake in a well-funded growth stage company
A hybrid in-office approach, allowing you to work remotely a couple of days a week
A WFH stipend to support your home office setup
The ability to work from anywhere up to four weeks per year with SeatGeek on Tour
Benefits package that supports health/dental/vision. We also provide annual subscriptions to Headspace, Ginger.io, and One Medical 
A focus on transparency. We have regular company meetings and Q&A panels where employees can chat openly with teams across SeatGeek, our co-founders, and external guests from the industry
$120 a month to spend on tickets to live events
Annual subscription to Spotify, Apple Music, or Amazon music

As an equal opportunities employer, we recognize that diversity is a positive attribute and we welcome the differences and benefits that a diverse culture brings. Come join us!
